p.codeblock: public abstract int registerAudioEncodedFrameObserver( AudioEncodedFrameObserverConfig config, IAudioEncodedFrameObserver observer);
virtual int registerAudioEncodedFrameObserver(const AudioEncodedFrameObserverConfig& config, IAudioEncodedFrameObserver *observer) = 0;
public abstract int RegisterAudioEncodedFrameObserver(AudioEncodedFrameObserverConfig config, IAudioEncodedFrameObserver observer);

ul.li: Call this method after joining a channel.
由于该方法和 都会设置音频内容和音质，不建议该方法和 一起使用。 otherwise, only the method called later will take effect.

plentry.pd: Observer settings for the encoded audio. See .

section.p: When the method call succeeds, there is no return value; when fails, the exception is thrown; you need to catch the exception and handle it accordingly.
